metadata.name: Balmain x Space Runners Unicorn #1
metadata.description:
The Balmain x Space Runners limited edition Unicorn brings together the iconic physical Balmain Unicorn Sneakers paired with Digital Collectible NFTs.

 This Unicorn NFT is your gateway to access exclusive utilities including early access to future limited edition Balmain drops, exclusive physical accessories, digital wearables for games and metaverses, future Space Runners token airdrops, and more.
      
 To prevent any exploit: The physical Unicorn counterpart pertaining to this NFT has already been redeemed. The NFT however will continue to provide utilities rolled out between Balmain x Space Runners.
      
 Disclaimer:  Please be aware that purchasing these NFTs does not provide any rights or permission to use the associated intellectual property (IP) in any way. Regardless of the reason, ownership of the NFTs does not equate to ownership or usage of the IP.
      
       
 View more details on claim.spacerunners.com
